price: Ǹjẹ́ Ẹni tí Ó dá ẹ̀dá dà bí ẹni tí kò dá ẹ̀dá bí? Nítorí náà, ṣé ẹ ò níí lo ìrántí ni?
arabic: أَفَمَن يَخۡلُقُ كَمَن لَّا يَخۡلُقُۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: afaman yakhluqu kaman lā yakhluqu afalā tadhakkarūna
